results.name: Triangle of compositions with a total that is no more than n into exactly k parts each no more than k.
link: Index entries for sequences related to compositions
xref: Rows eventually start like A000312. Central diagonal is A001700. Right hand side and central diagonal is like right hand side of A007318. Cf. A077227.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Oct 30 2002
